short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms your browser with a breathtaking view of the night sky filled with vibrant stars, swirling auroras, and deep clouds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Featuring a peaceful rural landscape with a glowing tree and a cozy house under the mesmerizing starry heavens, this theme offers a perfect blend of serenity and wonder. Customize your browser with this captivating backdrop and let the universe unfold every time you open a new tab.
